channel.title: How do I change the max stat?
channel.description: How do i change the max stat? on my server its 135 i want it to be 99, and how do i change requirments for things like spells, weapons, and armor?

item.title: How do I change the max stat?
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

just search return 135; and change that to return 99;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2008, 06:48:36 AM[/size][hr][quote="_Vengeance, post:5, topic:178677"][quote author=justa lol link=topic=239696.msg2033640#msg2033640 date=1202228688]
if your max stat is 99 search for return 99; in client.java just change to return 200; that makes you highest lvl 200 and combat 255
[/quote]

Did you read what he wrote?
He wants to change it [b]from 135 [b]to 99.[/quote]

did you read what i wrote i said IF lvl was 99

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the max stat?
